subject: Re: [junit] Private method throws an exception
msgSnippet: Can you make the private method protected, and override it in the test? Good luck, David Saff
messageBody:
Can you make the private method protected, and override it in the test?
Good luck,

David Saff

mitchellch60 wrote:

> My method under test calls a private method in the same class. The
> private method throws an exception preventing me for completing my
> unit test.
>
> Any suggestions?
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
